question.title: CDS based Audit Logging in CAP
question.body:
We are trying to perform audit logging for the user details when changed using the annotation mentioned below. But when the patch call is triggered for the entity, the changes are not logged in the terminal console. The service is draft enabled here.

Would like to understand if there are any other config needs to be maintained in the repo/service to get the audit logs displayed in the terminal. We referred to the incident sample service and ran in local, the log are displayed in the console.

using { com.sap.p2p.requisition.model } as dm from './BuyingDefaults';

annotate dm.BuyingDefaults with @PersonalData: {
    DataSubjectRole: 'User',
    EntitySemantics: 'DataSubject'
}
{
    UserID @PersonalData.FieldSemantics : 'DataSubjectID';
    CompanyCode @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
    Plant @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
    PurchasingOrganization @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
    PurchasingGroup @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;

    CostCenter @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
    GLAccount @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
    Currency @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;

    ShipTo @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
    ShipToAddress @PersonalData.IsPotentiallyPersonal;
}

annotate dm.BuyingDefaults with @AuditLog.Operation : {
  Update : true
};
